body: Hi everyone,  I am trying to show the VSC (vertical sky component) over the facade of a building but turns out the output I get is 14 times bigger that the number of points in my grid, and therefore the "Ladybug re-color mesh" component fails to work. Does anyone know why is are the results larger than my grid and how could I make it work?  Thanks! Alejandro[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/n9CkP9pTfMNWeHrrIfaOu-iu1evQdisRLs65*Apqz-gXcDPmx9DW1CcS9nLkAdKQrsbJVOMpCkbGeV4wmJgTV5i-fLsB03Z6/Capture.JPG)

Hi Alejandro,
